programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Dauphin Island
programme.desc: Cinnamon rolls and surf. This laid-back destination has something for everyone.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Sweet Treats to Tickle Your Taste Buds from the Midwest
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into the Midwest's sweets. From the messy madness of puppy chow to kolaches to the infamous buckeye, enjoy the delicious confections that make the region a haven for dessert lovers.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Chef Mom Throws Down Against Chef Dad in Kids Menu Match-Up
programme.desc: Food truck father Jimmy Longoria is up against munchy meal mother Helen Markatos. Can these chefs elevate the kids menu? Or will their dishes send them to time out?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Re-creating Southern Comfort Classic vs. Elevated American Fusion
programme.desc: It’s a culinary battle of the senses between two iconic chefs in the City Beautiful. Watch as Chef Liz of Garp & Fuss in Winter Park takes on Chef Trina of Se7en Bites in The Milk District. It’s The Knife versus The Whisk!

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Serial Killers
programme.desc: Two serial killers whose chilling crimes left their communities devastated.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Show Me Milwaukee: Surreal Art Experiences, Painting Lesson and an Artistic Hotel
programme.desc: International muralist Emma Daisy and Greg explore Milwaukee’s creative community. They take a tour of the Saint Kate art hotel, visit art galleries, get a painting lesson and experience the surreal underwater exhibit at Deep Lake Future.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Band's Homecoming Hits High Note For Generosity
programme.desc: Who says you can't go home again? The team travels back to where it all began to pay back the kindness they experienced 25 years ago when they first got started.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Unique Therapies
programme.desc: These therapy methods might be outside the box, but are helping many

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Newlyweds, Bakeries & Beer
programme.desc: Bring on the newlyweds! Two recently-married couples explore bakeries from around the world, grab dinner and a show, and dive into local brew culture on cheap dates in Orlando.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Escape From Cambridge
programme.desc: Rob proves that this iconic locale is more than just Ivy League. He makes pasta from scratch, crafts a custom knife and tries to make an escape from one of the toughest spots in all of Beantown.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Havoc-Wreaking Hackers
programme.desc: Cyber-burglars, a dangerous mix of con artist and geek, wreak havoc on the technologically vulnerable. Our experts offer tips to spot such high-tech trickery before it's too late.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Grisly Discovery on the Gulf Coast
programme.desc: When body parts wash ashore in the Gulf Coast over several days in 2012, investigators must identify the victim before they can find the killers. Even then, justice is elusive.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Putting the Charm in Carb City
programme.desc: Charm City becomes Carb City in this bread-driven battle. Watch as chefs Ferhat Yalcin and Jonathan Hicks see who can carbo-load their way to victory.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay: Zipping & Dipping in Columbus, IN
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Stunning architecture awaits in this surprising Indiana city. Sip history at a classic soda fountain and enjoy ramen downtown. Seek thrills with zip lining and unwind in an outdoor bath in the woods.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Magnetic Musician Flying High For a Chance at Love
programme.desc: Soar new heights with Kenny, a single musician who is ready for his three blind dates. What amazing woman will prevail? Will romance be in the air with Domonique, will love roll into his heart with Ashlee, or will he find treasure with Kara?

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Baseball Legend Ryan Ripken Pitches Angel a Day of Iconic Institutions
programme.desc: Angel joins baseball legend, Ryan Ripken, for a home run day, exploring the best of Baltimore. They bat 100 at Ripken Stadium, learn about sea life at the National Aquarium, crush indoor rock climbing and show down in an epic cook-off.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Take a Chicken Yoga Class in Ybor City, FL
programme.desc: In historic Ybor City, different cultures bring out the best in one another. Enjoy an authentic Cuban sandwich or dine at a restaurant now on its fifth generation of ownership. After chicken yoga (yes, that’s a thing!), treat yourself to a hand-rolled cigar.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Local radio personality, Greg Adams, wants to shine a light on all parts of his beloved city and prove that Milwaukee has a lot more to offer than people might expect. In each episode, Greg is joined by a notable personality from the community who shows him their favorite spots and the best ways to experience them.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Unexpected Eats with Midwest Flair
programme.desc: Uncover the Midwest's unexpected. From quirky to inventive flavor mash-ups like the bulgogi burger to the questionable sour cream & raisin pie, see how the area crafts some interesting but delightful culinary concoctions.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: Widowed At 19
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Two high school sweethearts had their love story cut too short.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Link in the Mardi Gras Murders
programme.desc: The brutal murders of two trans women of color just 48 hours apart in New Orleans unsettle the community, leaving many wondering if the cases are connected. Detectives uncover clues, yet justice remains elusive.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.
